title: Ask HN: Any Good Electron.js Resources?

Ask HN: DigitalOcean vs. Render
text:
I’m planning to build out my own SaaS tool with hopefully real users, and I’m trying to decide where to deploy it.

In the past, I’ve only hosted small projects, blogs, etc on DigitalOcean, but I’m not too familiar with devops and am in fear something could go wrong.

Would using a PaaS like Render work a lot better? I plan to use Postgres/Redis.

Would love thoughts, tips, or resources for help!

Tell HN: Oracle Cloud is shutting down free instances
text: Oracle is going to reclaim idle instances. What's interesting is there definition of idle is not zero use. It sounds like you can keep using the free tier if you switch to pay-as-you-go.
